attributes.action: Retest all drivers every 5 years or so
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Watching the ITV programe 'Driving me Crazy'(22.05.07) looked into the reaction times for oap's while driving. The results where astonishing! and not in a good way! Im not suggesting the driving test we all had to pass but a compency test for reaction times, hesitancy, ability to see etc...for everybody not just oap's. Safety should ALWAYS be paramount. If we are as good and as confident in driving as we think we are, the test shouldnt worry anybody but it will stop alot of accidents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
